content.body: 262 is not a good place for event loop APIs. The current job infrastructure is terribly broken due to lack of desire to engage with realistic execution environments like the browser and node. The committee is specifically uninterested in getting this right.
queueMicrotask is in Chrome and Safari masters, I believe
Hmm maybe stalled in Chrome :-/
i think i'm going to pr it to node then
